Timeline

Inspiration

Feeling creative, but not sure in what style you want to photograph today? Gain some visual inspiration by searching for topics you'll encounter on your way below, guaranteed that something will catch your eye!

Mood boards

These are the handy moodboards you created beforehand on Pinterest; to keep them up-to-date, just edit the board in Pinterest and they'll refresh here automatically.

Notes

Here, you can stash a few annotations of experiences on this trip that you'd like to remember afterwards. These will come in handy once you get home when making descriptions per photo collection, or when making a photo book.
